## Submission Checklist
<!-- Mark with [x] when complete -->

- [ ] Opportunity is for activist/social justice artists
- [ ] All required fields are filled out
- [ ] Dates are in YYYY-MM-DD format
- [ ] At least one category is selected
- [ ] At least one opportunity type is selected
- [ ] Award amount or benefits are clearly stated in description
